frontmatter.title: True meaning of Christmas
frontmatter.description: What is Christmas about? Why do we celebrate it? These are all some great questions. Let's take a look at the true meaning of Christmas

frontmatter.title: God does the impossible!
frontmatter.description: God can do the impossible in your life!

frontmatter.title: Introducing the Sword of the Spirit
frontmatter.description: What is the the Sword of the Spirit. It's the Word of God. It's your weapon against the enemy. It's sharper than any double-edged sword!

frontmatter.title: Latest Updates!
frontmatter.description: It's been awhile since you guys have heard from me. Some of you may be wondering what happened to me?

verses.overrideVerse: [22] But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, patience, kindness, goodness, faithfulness, [23] gentleness, self-control; against such things there is no law. (ESV)
[26] But the Helper, the Holy Spirit, whom the Father will send in my name, he will teach you all things and bring to your remembrance all that I have said to you. (ESV)

[19] Or do you not know that your body is a temple of the Holy Spirit within you, whom you have from God? You are not your own, [20] for you were bought with a price. So glorify God in your body. (ESV)
[38] And Peter said to them, â€œRepent and be baptized every one of you in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins, and you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit. (ESV)
[26] Likewise the Spirit helps us in our weakness. For we do not know what to pray for as we ought, but the Spirit himself intercedes for us with groanings too deep for words. (ESV)
[13] May the God of hope fill you with all joy and peace in believing, so that by the power of the Holy Spirit you may abound in hope. (ESV)
[13] In him you also, when you heard the word of truth, the gospel of your salvation, and believed in him, were sealed with the promised Holy Spirit, (ESV)
[5] he saved us, not because of works done by us in righteousness, but according to his own mercy, by the washing of regeneration and renewal of the Holy Spirit, (ESV)

frontmatter.title: Gifts of the Holy Spirit
frontmatter.description: Did you know that when you accept the free gift of salvation that you receive the Holy Spirit. It is the goal of the Holy Spirit to transform you to become like Jesus through a process that is called sanctification. Let's look at one way the Holy Spirit does this. Which, is through spiritual gifts
